Spell resistance equal to 11 + class level
+2 on Listen, Search, and Spot checks

name: +1 atk with slings and thrown weapons
+2 on saving throws against mind affecting spells and abilities, including possession
+2 on Bluff, Diplomacy, and Intimidate checks
+2 on Disguise checks made to impersonate a human
Kalashtar sleep but they do not dream
+2 on Intimidate, Bluff, and Move Silently checks

As Small creatures, pixies gain a +1 size bonus to Armor Class, a +1 size bonus on attack rolls, and a +4 size bonus on Hide checks, but they must use smaller weapons than Medium-size creatures do, and their lifting and carrying limits are three-quarters of those of Medium-size characters
Daylight 1/day as a 1st level caster or a caster of his class levels, whichever is higher
4 extra skill points at 1st level and 1 extra skill point at each additional level, since underfolk (like their human ancestors) are versitile and capable
+1 on attack rolls against kobolds and goblinoids (including goblins, hobgoblins, and bugbears)
+4 dodge bonus to Armor Class against monsters of the giant type (such as ogres, trolls, and hill giants)
+4 on Hide and Move Silently checks

+1 on attack rolls against goblinoids (goblins, hobgoblins, bugbears, bakemono, and goblin rats)
+2 on Hide and Move Silently checks
+2 on saving throws against poison and disease
A nezumi with the Scent feat can detect opponents by sense of smell as a free action, generally within 30ft
The nezumi detects another creature's presence but not its specific location
A nezumi with the Scent feat can follow tracks by smell, making a Wisdom check to find or follow a track
Nezumi with the Scent feat can identify familiar odors just as humans do familiar sights
+4 on Hide checks when in woods or forest
+2 on saving throws against spells and spell-like effects with the word "water" in the name of the effect, shugenja spells of the water element, and wu jen spells connected to water
Once per day a river spirit folk can use "speak with animals"
They do not need to make Swim checks to swim normally
+2 on saving throws against spells and spell-like effects with the fire descriptor
A sea spirit folk can make a Knowledge (nature) check (or an untrained intelligence check) with a +2 racial bonus to predict the weather for the next 24 hours
Special* +8 on Climb checks, Use Str or Dex whichever is higher
+2 on Hide and Move Silently checks
+2 on all saving throws against spells and spell-like effects
+2 on Intimidate checks made against animals and humanoids
-2 penalty on Diplomacy, Handle Animal, Perform, and Sense Motive checks
A "single" dvati is a pair of creatures that shares a soul
The dvati twins divide their hit points between them
A pair of dvati twins shares all class abilities and spells slots between them
A mind-affecting ability or spell that affects one twin affects both of them
The dvati twins have an innate, powerful psychic connection
If one dvati twin dies, the other slowly sickens and perishes
In most cases, an effect that applies to one twin fails to spill over to the other
In many ways, a lupin's acute sense of smell works like the scent ability but without the automatic nature of scent
A lupin automatically gets to attempt a DC 10 Wisdom check to detect a lycanthrope within 30ft, regardless of what form the creature takes
A lupin has a better ability to detect and distinguish the scents of creatures than a human
A lupin within 5ft of an invisible or hidden creature is entitled to a DC 10 Wisdom check as a free action to pinpoint that creature
A lupin gains a +2 on all Survival checks made to follow tracks
Lupins take a -2 penalty on all saving throws against attacks based on odor (such as a stinking cloud spell or a ghast's stench)
+1 bonus on attack rolls and damage rolls against werewolves
+2 on all Jump and Escape Artist checks
